item.title: P5 optical illusion example
item.description: The following illusion is called Caf√© Wall, it consists of simple elements as it is some black and white squares displayed inside parallel rows tricking our eyes to see not parallel rows as it actually is but evidencing a few slopped squares especially at the ends or sides of the rows. Here is part of the code used to make this visualization: function draw() { groutWidth = 139 / 25; background('#444444*2'); numRows = ceil(1000 / (sqWidth)) + 1; for (let i = 0; i < numRows; i = i + 1) { line(0, i * sqWidth, 480, i * sqWidth); drawRow(i); } }
